ygData.subject: Re: Pottery Skill, to Rokenn Swiftsong (was re: Forage Skill)
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry for the off-topic thread. The best way to raise your pottery skill is to do the items in the pottery book in the order they are presented.  My skill is
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry for the off-topic thread.

The best way to raise your pottery skill is to do the items in the pottery
book in the order they are presented. My skill is in the 130's I have not
bothered to max it yet with large bowls (last item in pottery book). The
best city I have found for pottery is Kelethin, I have heard that Halas has
all the need stuff as well.

If you wish to discuss more about pottery please email me direct at
rokenn@...

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server
